solution_line_template: Sarah uses {shampoo_daily_oz}+{conditioner_daily_oz}=<<{shampoo_daily_oz}+{conditioner_daily_oz}={daily_total_volume}>>{daily_total_volume} ounces of hair care products daily.
In {total_days} days, Sarah will use {total_days}*{daily_total_volume}=<<{total_days}*{daily_total_volume}={total_volume_used}>>{total_volume_used} ounces of hair care products.
